thread.title: Five drown during prayers in Limpopo river
thread.title_full: Five drown during prayers in Limpopo river | News24

author: news24.com
title: Five drown during prayers in Limpopo river
text:
Johannesburg - Five men drowned during a prayer session in the Crocodile River near Thabazimbi over the weekend, Limpopo police said on Monday.
They tried to help a woman who got into difficulty in the water on Sunday morning, Colonel Ronel Otto said.
They were aged between 16 and 54 and members of the Sevumwelwani church. The woman managed to get to safety.
